name: Tisland
description:
The Story:
    You are the famous pirate captain Fishook. You were on you way to the Tilad archipelago to recover the Great Treasure for the Tisland island, but during a short-lived mutiny, your map was shredded to pieces! You must now put it back together, or else the expedition is doomed!

The Rules:
    In this fast-paced puzzle game, you must put back together the map by filling the grid with pieces of various shapes and sizes. Each turn you must choose between 3 pieces, and then place the selected piece on the map. Each placed piece will earn you points, depending on the size of the piece and the time it took you to place it. The base points of each piece is indicated when you're selecting a piece. Be aware that upon the end of the game, you will loose 2 points per free tile!

The Controls:
    Arrow keys - Select/Move a piece
    Z - Rotate the piece 90°
    X - Flip the piece horizontally
    C - Select/Place a piece

The Creator's Note:
    This game was made for Trijam n°105, and I made it with my dad :D. It was a really fun experience, and it we had a really nice time designing and making the game :) .

The Credits:
    Geek_Joystick - Game Design, Programming, Sound Design
    Ludeek - Game Design, Art

    We used this artwork to make our game map.
    We used a premade font.
